definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: over-spread, over-lay, coat, besmear (NH id.; cf. Ar. t.a0xa re foeda contaminatus fuit, or contaminavit; mut.ay=axun camel smeared with tar);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְטָח]] consec. Le 14:42 (on [[טַח]] Is 44:18 v. [[טחח]]); 3 pl. [[טָחוּ]] Ex 22:28; [[טַחְתֶּם]] Ez Eze 13:12, Eze 13:14 Inf. cstr. [[לָטוּחַ]] 1Ch 29:4; Pt. pl. [[טָחִים]] Ez Eze 13:10 + 2 t.; cstr. [[טָחֵי]] Ez Eze 13:11; only P Ez Ch;—over-spread, coat (c. acc. of house) with earth (clay, [[עָפָר]]) Le 14:42; over-lay (walls with gold and silver) c. acc. of wall 1Ch 29:4; metaph. of coating over Jerusalem, under fig. of a wall, with a superficial coating, to hide its real weakness Ez Eze 13:15 (acc. of wall), v:Eze 13:12 c. acc. of coating ([[טִיחַ]]); with [[תָּפֵל]] (q.v.) v:Eze 13:11; c. 2 acc. v:Eze 13:10, v:Eze 13:14, v:Eze 13:15; cf. [[תָּפֵל וּנְבִיאֶיהָ טָחוּ להם]] Ez Eze 22:28 where sf. ref. to oppressive nobles, i.e. the prophets ‘whitewash’ for them (their evil deeds).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[הִטּוֹחַ]] be coated (with [[עפר]]) Le 14:43; and, fully, [[הִטּׂחַ את־הבית]] Le 14:48 (both P).
